attributes.action: Make cannabis legal then we wouldn't need to make any budget cuts!
attributes.additional_details: Just look at all the money some states in America and other countries are making along with their crime rates before and after legalising
attributes.background: the  answer to leaving the EU without any budget cuts that would if anything make loads of money in tax, reduce crime rates and help the sick , it's time our country woke up and legalised cannabis for sale in shops for personal use
